docs.title: Qanta
docs.text: A Python library for analysts and quants.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Type-safe: Full type hints with strict mypy checking
  • Modern Python: Supports Python 3.11, 3.12, and 3.13
  • Well-tested: Comprehensive test coverage

docs.title: Next Steps
docs.text:
• Getting Started — Installation and first steps
  • API Reference — Complete API documentation

docs.title: License
docs.text: Qanta is licensed under the Apache 2.0 License.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: This guide will help you install Qanta and start using it in your projects.

docs.title: From Source
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/QminersOrg/qanta.git
cd qanta
uv sync --all-extras

docs.title: Verifying Installation
docs.text:
After installation, verify that Qanta is correctly installed:

import qanta

print(qanta.__version__)
